subtitle: You could use sweetcorn instead of lentils if you prefer.

method.text: Heat the butter in a pan. Stir in the flour and cook for 1 min. Stir in the tomato juice. Bring to the boil and continue stirring over a low heat until a thick sauce is obtained. Add a little seasoning. Stir in the breadcrumbs. Then stir in the lentils.
When cool enough to handle, form into 4 croquette shapes. Toss in the flour to lightly dust, then coat in the beaten egg, shaking off any excess and then the crisps or oats.
Heat enough oil in a frying pan to coat the base then cook the croquettes for 2 min on either side until crisp and golden brown.
Drain thoroughly on kitchen paper and serve.

title: Lentil and tomato croquettes
